Defs:
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef ParentName="PenguinJawPart" Abstract="true"> EtherPenguinBeak PenguinMorph penguin beak
Parts/None/None
adapting
A penguin beak. The strange shape makes speaking very difficult.
adapted
A penguin beak. Adapting to it has made speaking less frustrating.
paragon
A penguin beak. With further adaptation, [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to speak normally.
EtherPenguinEar PenguinMorph penguin earhole
EtherPenguinTail PenguinMorph penguin tailfeathers
